abstract: Photo of IBF welterweight champion Kell Brook during outdoor public workout in London.
lead_paragraph: Ferentz is one of the nation’s longest-tenured coaches, having been hired in 1999. A 12-2 season and a Rose Bowl berth in 2015 convinced the Hawkeyes to hold on to him.
snippet: Ferentz is one of the nation’s longest-tenured coaches, having been hired in 1999. A 12-2 season and a Rose Bowl berth in 2015 convinced the Hawkeyes to hold on to him....

headline.main: Iowa Extends Contract of Football Coach Kirk Ferentz Until 2025
